talkbelow-reply: Label of the button to open the reply form
talkbelow-cancel: Label of the button to close the reply form
talkbelow-new-topic: Title of the new topic section
talkbelow-title: Placeholder of the title field for new topics
talkbelow-comment: Placeholder of the comment field for new topics
talkbelow-publish: Label of the button to publish a new topic or reply
talkbelow-error: Error message when something goes wrong
